title: Sketches from Jamaica, West Indies
medium:
Recto: Graphite on gray paper
Verso: Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray paper
description:
Recto: Horizontal view showing:  distant view of four women, three of whom carry loads upon their heads, of a seated person and some indistinct objects at top left; a walking man seen from the back at top right; a palm tree at center; a woman carrying a load upon her hat seen from the back at left center; a child, a half figure, a detail of the palm at right center.

Verso: landscape seen horizontally showing the sky with some clouds over moutain ranges and the sea.
name: Drawing
